title: Add a developer story to the Credits page

requirements.text: Update the existing Credits page to include a clearly labeled "Developer Story" section with user-facing text in English that states: Henry English is the founder and technical manager of the app and that he believes in an Uber-style format.

quotes: Yes I want me the developer story behind the app that say Henry english the founder and technical manager who believes in uber format

acceptanceCriteria: On the Credits page, a new section titled "Developer Story" is visible to all users.
The Developer Story text explicitly includes: "Henry English" and describes him as "the founder and technical manager".
The Developer Story text explicitly communicates that he "believes in an Uber-style format" (wording may be lightly edited for grammar, but meaning must be preserved).
Existing Credits requirements remain intact (the page still names "Henry English" and includes the phrase "A Sierra Leone Living Legend").

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep changes within the existing single-page Credits flow (do not introduce new backend canister methods for static text).
nonGoals: Adding new navigation items or changing the existing routing/navigation structure.
Changing authentication, trip, or payouts behavior.
Adding third-party integrations or external content sources for the story.
